overview: Oversize Load is the story of a warehouse worker traveling with his trusty dog in his new truck, seeking out truckers. Scott O'Hara encounters Cody Steele, a hot truck driver and a wild sex scene comes about. Next Scott stops at a truck stop to clean up. While in the truckers' showers, he witnesses a hot scene between two more hot, humpy truckers â€” Jeff Turk and newcomer Franco Gonella. On the road again, Scott and his faithful dog stop at a roadside port-o-potty and encounter a hot blond number, Ken Worth.
title: Oversize Load
